name: Fitting In (pyxld_kris)
description:
INSTRUCTIONS:

FOLLOW THE DIRECTIONS ABOVE EACH SLIDE  ENTRYWAY IN ORDER TO GROW/SHRINK YOUR CUBE TO FIT INTO POWERUP CUBBIES. GO THE FARTHEST. GET THE HIGHEST SCORE. DON'T HIT SPIKES. ENJOY.

Game by Kris Gano

Music by Fran Lock
